reviewText: We have disconnected our cable and have no antenna which has effectively made our television a movie box. We have purchased all of the western multiple movie packs we can find and this one definitely rates as one of the best. Some great old movies on very good quality media.

MADACY's HOLLYWOOD WESTERN box set features 10 public domain films that are in wide circulation. Distinguishing features of this collection are its attractive tin storage case and booklet containing bios and rare photos. Each disc has such extras as bios, fun facts and movie previews. Transfer quality of the vintage unrestored films is average. BCI's THE WILD WEST 10 MOVIE PACK is a more modern mix of budget-priced westerns. PROGRAM: (Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website.) DISC ONE-- (6.8) Angel And The Badman (1947) - John Wayne/Gail Russell/Harry Carey (6.3) Abilene Town (1946) - Randolph Scott/Edgar Buchanan/Ann Dvorak BONUS: Bios - John Wayne, Randolph Scott Fun Facts Previews: Under California Stars, Santa Fe Trail DISC TWO (5.0) Under California Stars (1948) - Roy Rogers/Andy Devine (6.0) Santa Fe Trail (1940) - Errol Flynn/Ronald Reagan/Olivia de Havilland BONUS: Bios - Errol Flynn, Roy Rogers Fun Facts Previews: The Outlaw, Mystery of the Hooded Horseman DISC THREE-- (5.5) The Outlaw (1943) - Jane Russell/Walter Huston (5.7) The Mystery Of The Hooded Horseman (1937) - Tex Ritter BONUS: Bios - Jane Russell, Tex Ritter Fun Facts Previews: Painted Desert, Man of the Frontier DISC FOUR-- (5.6) The Painted Desert (1931) - William Boyd/Clark Gable (5.9) Man Of The Frontier ("Red River Valley") (1936) - Gene Autry/Smiley Burnette BONUS: Bios - William Farnum, Gene Autry Fun Facts Previews: Rage at Dawn, Vengeance Valley DISC FIVE-- (5.8) Rage At Dawn (1955) - Randolph Scott/Forrest Tucker (5.8) Vengeance Valley (1951) - Burt Lancaster/Robert Walker/Joanne Dru BONUS: Bios - Forrest Tucker, Burt Lancaster Fun Facts Previews: Angel and the Badman, Abilene Town
